at.ac.tuwien.ims.towardsthelight.ui

Class SpriteFont

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.ac.tuwien.ims.towardsthelight.ui.SpriteFont

  • public class SpriteFont
extends java.lang.Object
    Describes a font as an image containing all characters.
    Author:
    Felix Kugler, Thomas Koch

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description

      Enumeration of available fonts.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SpriteFont

        public SpriteFont(android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap,
                  java.lang.String characters,
                  int[] widths)
        Creates a new font from the given image.
        Author: Felix Kugler
        Parameters:
        bitmap - Image containing all the characters densely packed.
        characters - Characters in the order they appear in the bitmap.
        widths - Width of each character.

      • getDimensions

        public int[] getDimensions(java.lang.String text)
        Calculates the dimensions (width, height) of text.
        Author: Thomas Koch
        Parameters:
        text - the string which dimensions are calculated
        Returns:
        the dimensions of text as an integer array. Index 0 contains the width, index 1 the height.
